attributes.action: ban the playing or requesting of "The Boomstick Song/Work The Drill" in UK bars/clubs/entertainment venues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Broomstick song is an awful mashup of two fantastic tunes which was created over 6 months ago. In the past two months it has been over played and over requested to the point where 75% of requests to DJs are for this tune. We petition the Prime Minister to ban the playing or requesting of this tune.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
